alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wabash; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 30 at 8:21PM CDT until April 07 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony. .The Wabash River at New Harmony is forecast to rise to its crest near 16.4 feet Friday morning, then will fall to below flood stage the following Thursday, April 7th. For the Wabash River...including New Harmony...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW CONTINUES THROUGH THURSDAY, APRIL 7TH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...Until Thursday, April 7th. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, The river overflows low ground on the Illinois side. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 15.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.4 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage the following Thursday, April 7th. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
